result.markdown:
---
title: "Pagination + Offset"
editor_options: 
   chunk_output_type: console
---

::: {.cell}

:::

## Pagination Example 1

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
base <- request("https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset") |> 
  req_url_path_append("9887a515-7552-4693-bf58-735c77af46d7") |> 
  req_url_path_append("data")

base
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
<httr2_request>
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
GET
https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/9887a515-7552-4693-bf58-735c77af46d7/data
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Body: empty
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
stats <- base |> 
  req_url_path_append("stats")

stats
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
<httr2_request>
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
GET
https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/9887a515-7552-4693-bf58-735c77af46d7/data/stats
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Body: empty
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
stats <- stats |> 
  req_perform() |> 
  resp_body_json(simplifyVector = TRUE)

stats |> purse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
- $found_rows i1  47984
- $total_rows i1  47984
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
offset_sequence(
  nobs = stats$found_rows, 
  limit = 5000)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1]     0  5001 10001 15001 20001 25001 30001 35001 40001 45001 47984
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
urls <- glue::glue(
  "{base$url}",
  "?size=5000&",
  "offset=",
  "{offset_sequence(nobs = stats$found_rows, limit = 5000)}"
)

resp <- urls[1:3] |> 
  purrr::map(
    function(x) {
      httr2::request(x) |> 
        httr2::req_perform() |> 
        httr2::resp_body_json(simplifyVector = TRUE) |> 
        dplyr::tibble()
    }) |> 
  purrr::list_rbind(names_to = "req") |> 
  janitor::clean_names()

resp |> 
  janitor::get_dupes()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
No variable names specified - using all columns.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 6 × 15
    req first_name last_name npi        specialty  optout_effective_date
  <int> <chr>      <chr>     <chr>      <chr>      <chr>

4     3 David      Fernitz   1225232226 Dentist    03/15/2016           
5     3 Martin     Drooker   1326103029 Psychiatry 04/01/2016           
6     3 Martin     Drooker   1326103029 Psychiatry 04/01/2016           
# ℹ 9 more variables: optout_end_date <chr>, first_line_street_address <chr>,
#   second_line_street_address <chr>, city_name <chr>, state_code <chr>,
#   zip_code <chr>, eligible_to_order_and_refer <chr>, last_updated <chr>,
#   dupe_count <int>
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dupes <- resp |> 
  count(npi, sort = TRUE) |> 
  filter(n > 1) |> 
  pull(npi)

resp |> 
  filter(npi %in% dupes) |> 
  arrange(npi)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
resp |> 
  filter(npi %in% c("1225232226", "1740295518", "1326103029")) |> 
  relocate(last_updated) |> 
  arrange(npi)
```

:::

## Pagination Example 2

Select Dataset

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distribution <- read_json_arrow(
  file = "https://data.cms.gov/data.json",
  col_select = c("dataset"),
  as_data_frame = TRUE) |> 
  to_duckdb() |> 
  pull(dataset) |> 
  pluck(1) |> 
  select(distribution) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  unnest(distribution) |> 
  rename_with(remove_at_symbol) |> 
  filter(format      == "API", 
         description == "latest") |> 
  handle_na()

distribution |> 
  filter(grepl("Enrollment", title)) |> 
  pull(title)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Federally Qualified Health Center Enrollments : 2024-10-01"      
[2] "Home Health Agency Enrollments : 2024-10-01"                     
[3] "Hospice Enrollments : 2024-10-01"                                
[4] "Hospital Enrollments : 2024-12-01"                               
[5] "Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment : 2024-09-01"
[6] "Rural Health Clinic Enrollments : 2024-10-01"                    
[7] "Skilled Nursing Facility Enrollments : 2024-12-01"               
[8] "Medicare Monthly Enrollment : 2024-09-01"                        
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
accessURL <- distribution |> 
  filter(grepl("Opt Out Affidavits : ", title)) |> 
  pull(accessURL)

accessURL
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "https://data.cms.gov/data-api/v1/dataset/9887a515-7552-4693-bf58-735c77af46d7/data"
```


:::
:::

Format Query

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
query <- glue::glue(
  'c(
    "filter[id-{FID}][path]"  = "{PATH}",
    "filter[id-{FID}][value]" = "{VALUE}"
  )', 
  FID = 1, 
  PATH = "State Code", 
  VALUE = "CA")

query
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
c(
  "filter[id-1][path]"  = "State Code",
  "filter[id-1][value]" = "CA"
)
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
query <- query |> 
  rlang::parse_expr() |> 
  rlang::eval_bare()

query
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 filter[id-1][path] filter[id-1][value] 
       "State Code"                "CA" 
```


:::
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
queryurl <- accessURL |> 
  request() |> 
  req_url_query(size = 5000, !!!query)

nresults <- queryurl |> 
  req_url_path_append("stats") |> 
  req_perform() |> 
  resp_body_json() |> 
  gelm("found")

nresults
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 9288
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
reqs <- purrr::map(
  glue::glue(
    "{url}", 
    "offset={off}", 
    url = queryurl$url, 
    off = offset_sequence(nobs = nresults, limit = 5000)), 
  httr2::request)

res <- httr2::req_perform_parallel(reqs) |> 
  httr2::resps_successes()

res[[1]] |> 
  resp_body_json(simplifyVector = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
list()
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
queryurl |> 
  req_perform() |> 
  resp_body_json(simplifyVector = TRUE) |> 
  tibble()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

